models.name: discussion_board_guest_users
models.description: Guest users who can browse public content without authentication. They provide anonymous access to discussion board content with basic tracking for session management and user experience monitoring.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address of the guest user for anonymous session tracking and security monitoring.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser user agent string for compatibility and analytics purposes.

plainFields.name: session_token
plainFields.description: Temporary session identifier for tracking guest user interactions across page views.

plainFields.name: last_accessed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the guest user's last activity on the platform.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest user session was first recorded.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest user session data was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for guest user tracking, allowing data retention for analytics while marking inactive sessions.

models.name: discussion_board_registered_users
models.description: Registered users who have completed authentication and can fully participate in discussion board activities. They can create content, respond to discussions, vote, and access member-only features with proper account management.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address for authentication and notifications, must be unique across the platform.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for secure user authentication, stored as encrypted string.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Optional display name shown in discussions and profiles, can be changed by the user.

plainFields.name: email_verified
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the user's email address has been verified through confirmation process.

plainFields.name: last_login_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the user's most recent successful login.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account information was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for user accounts, preserving content attribution while removing access.

models.name: discussion_board_moderators
models.description: Moderators who have elevated permissions to manage content, users, and platform operations. They inherit registered user capabilities while adding administrative tools and oversight responsibilities through reference to their underlying user account. References {@link discussion_board_registered_users.id} for authentication and profile information.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_registered_user_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the registered user account this moderator inherits from. {@link discussion_board_registered_users.id}.

plainFields.name: promoted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user was promoted to moderator role.

plainFields.name: is_active_moderator
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the moderator account is currently active with full permissions.

plainFields.name: moderation_notes
plainFields.description: Internal notes for moderator management and performance tracking.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the moderator account information was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for moderator accounts, maintaining audit trail while removing active permissions.

models.name: discussion_board_categories
models.description: Category system for organizing economic and political discussion topics into themed groups, enabling filtered browsing and content organization.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Category name for economic or political themes (e.g., 'Economics', 'Politics', 'Policy').

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the category's focus area and acceptable topics within it.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier for the category, used for URL generation and API filtering.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the category was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the category.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for category removal without data loss.

models.name: discussion_board_topics
models.description: Core discussion topics created by registered users, serving as containers for economic and political conversations that can be moderated and locked.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_category_id
foreignFields.description: Category this topic belongs to. {@link discussion_board_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Topic title that summarizes the economic or political discussion.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Initial post content explaining the topic and starting the discussion.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier generated for the topic URL and referencing.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the topic (active/locked).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the topic was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last update to the topic.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for topic removal without losing discussion history.

models.name: discussion_board_comments
models.description: Threaded responses to discussion topics, allowing registered users to participate in economic and political conversations with reply hierarchies.

foreignFields.name: discussion_board_topic_id
foreignFields.description: Topic this comment belongs to. {@link discussion_board_topics.id}.

foreignFields.name: parent_discussion_board_comment_id
foreignFields.description: Parent comment if this is a reply in the thread. {@link discussion_board_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Comment text content contributing to the discussion.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier for the comment, used for referencing and permalinks.

plainFields.name: is_deleted
plainFields.description: Whether this comment is marked as deleted but preserved for discussion context.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the comment was posted.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last edit to the comment.

models.name: discussion_board_votes
models.description: User voting interactions on discussion topics and comments, enabling community-driven content quality assessment and popularity rankings. This table captures upvote/downvote actions to promote high-quality economic and political discussions while maintaining audit trails of user engagement.

plainFields.name: vote_type
plainFields.description: Type of vote (upvote or downvote) indicating user sentiment and contribution quality.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the vote was cast to track user engagement timing.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp for audit purposes.

models.name: discussion_board_notifications
models.description: User notification system for discussion board activities, including new comments, votes, and system announcements. This table manages personalized alerts to keep registered users engaged with relevant economic and political topic discussions, supporting both real-time and digest delivery options.

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Category of notification (comment_reply, topic_update, vote_received, moderation_action, system_announcement) to organize user alerts by importance.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Brief descriptive title for the notification displayed in user interfaces.

plainFields.name: message
plainFields.description: Detailed notification content providing context and actionable information about discussion activities.

plainFields.name: is_read
plainFields.description: Whether the user has viewed this notification to enable unread count tracking.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the notification was generated to maintain chronological order.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp for status updates.

models.name: discussion_board_reports
models.description: User-generated reports on content that may violate community standards in economic and political discussions. This table captures detailed information about reported content, including the reporter, reported item, reason, and moderation status. {@link discussion_board_topics} {@link discussion_board_comments}

foreignFields.name: reporter_id
foreignFields.description: Reporter's {@link discussion_board_registered_users.id} who submitted the report.

foreignFields.name: assigned_moderator_id
foreignFields.description: Assigned moderator's {@link discussion_board_moderators.id} handling this report.

plainFields.name: reported_content_type
plainFields.description: Type of content being reported (topic or comment).

plainFields.name: reported_content_id
plainFields.description: ID of the reported topic or comment.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Reason for the report (spam, inappropriate, harassment, etc.).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the reported issue.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the report (pending, in_review, resolved, dismissed).

plainFields.name: resolution
plainFields.description: Resolution details provided by the moderator.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the report was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the report was last updated.
